com.vdisk.net

类 VDiskAPI<SESS_T extends Session>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vdisk.net.VDiskAPI<SESS_T>

  • public class VDiskAPI<SESS_T extends Session>
extends Object
    Location of the VDisk API functions. The class is parameterized with the type of session it uses. This will be the same as the type of session you pass into the constructor.

    • 嵌套类概要

      Information about a user's account.

      A single entry in a DeltaPage.

      A page of DeltaEntrys (returned by delta).
      static class  VDiskAPI.Entry
      A metadata entry that describes a file or folder.
      static class  VDiskAPI.RequestAndResponse
      Holds an HttpUriRequest and the associated HttpResponse.
      static class  VDiskAPI.ThumbSize
      Represents the size of thumbnails that the API can return.

      A request to upload a file to VDisk.
      static class  VDiskAPI.VDiskFileInfo
      Contains info describing a downloaded file.
      static class  VDiskAPI.VDiskInputStream
      An InputStream for a file download that includes the associated VDiskAPI.VDiskFileInfo.
      static class  VDiskAPI.VDiskLink
      Contains a link to a VDisk stream or share and its expiration date.
      static class  VDiskAPI.VDiskUploadFileInfo
      Information about big file sections for uploading.

      • accountInfo

        public VDiskAPI.Account accountInfo()
                             throws VDiskException
        Returns the VDiskAPI.Account associated with the current Session.
        返回:
        the current session's VDiskAPI.Account.
        抛出:
        VDiskUnlinkedException - if you have not set an access token pair on the session, or if the user has revoked access.
        VDiskServerException - if the server responds with an error code. See the constants in VDiskServerException for the meaning of each error code.
        VDiskIOException - if any network-related error occurs.
        VDiskException - for any other unknown errors. This is also a superclass of all other VDisk exceptions, so you may want to only catch this exception which signals that some kind of error occurred.

      • getFile

        public VDiskAPI.VDiskFileInfo getFile(String path,
                             String rev,
                             OutputStream os,
                             File targetFile,
                             ProgressListener listener)
                               throws VDiskException
        Downloads a file from VDisk, copying it to the output stream. Returns the VDiskAPI.VDiskFileInfo for the file.
        参数:
        path - the VDisk path to the file.
        rev - the revision (from the file's metadata) of the file to download, or null to get the latest version.
        os - the OutputStream to write the file to.
        listener - an optional ProgressListener to receive progress updates as the file downloads, or null.
        返回:
        the VDiskAPI.VDiskFileInfo for the downloaded file.
        抛出:
        VDiskUnlinkedException - if you have not set an access token pair on the session, or if the user has revoked access.
        VDiskServerException - if the server responds with an error code. See the constants in VDiskServerException for the meaning of each error code. The most common error codes you can expect from this call are 404 (path not found) and 400 (bad rev).
        VDiskPartialFileException - if a network error occurs during the download.
        VDiskIOException - for some network-related errors.
        VDiskException - for any other unknown errors. This is also a superclass of all other VDisk exceptions, so you may want to only catch this exception which signals that some kind of error occurred.

        返回:

      • getFileStream

        public VDiskAPI.VDiskInputStream getFileStream(String path,
                                      String rev,
                                      File targetFile)
                                        throws VDiskException
        Downloads a file from VDisk. Returns a VDiskAPI.VDiskInputStream via which the file contents can be read from the network. You must close the stream when you're done with it to release all resources. You can also cancel the download by closing the returned VDiskAPI.VDiskInputStream at any time.
        参数:
        path - the VDisk path to the file.
        rev - the revision (from the file's metadata) of the file to download, or null to get the latest version.
        返回:
        a VDiskAPI.VDiskInputStream from which to read the file contents. The contents are retrieved from the network and not stored locally.
        抛出:
        VDiskUnlinkedException - if you have not set an access token pair on the session, or if the user has revoked access.
        VDiskServerException - if the server responds with an error code. See the constants in VDiskServerException for the meaning of each error code. The most common error codes you can expect from this call are 404 (path not found) and 400 (bad rev).
        VDiskIOException - if any network-related error occurs.
        VDiskException - for any other unknown errors. This is also a superclass of all other VDisk exceptions, so you may want to only catch this exception which signals that some kind of error occurred.

      • getVDiskFileInfo

        public VDiskAPI.VDiskFileInfo getVDiskFileInfo(String path,
                                      String rev)
                                        throws VDiskException
        Get the info of the file which will be downloaded. The info includes the download url and the metadata of the file.
        参数:
        path - the VDisk path to the file.
        rev - the revision (from the file's metadata) of the file to download, or null to get the latest version.
        返回:
        抛出:
        VDiskException

      • putFile

        public VDiskAPI.Entry putFile(String path,
                     InputStream is,
                     long length,
                     String parentRev,
                     ProgressListener listener)
                       throws VDiskException
        Uploads a file to VDisk. The upload will not overwrite any existing version of the file, unless the latest version on the VDisk server has the same rev as the parentRev given. Pass in null if you're expecting this to create a new file. Note: use putFileRequest() if you want to be able to cancel the upload.
        参数:
        path - the full VDisk path where to put the file, including directories and filename.
        is - the InputStream from which to upload.
        length - the amount of bytes to read from the InputStream.
        parentRev - the rev of the file at which the user started editing it (obtained from a metadata call), or null if this is a new upload. If null, or if it does not match the latest rev on the server, a copy of the file will be created and you'll receive the new metadata upon executing the request.
        listener - an optional ProgressListener to receive upload progress updates, or null.
        返回:
        a metadata VDiskAPI.Entry representing the uploaded file.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the file does not exist.
        VDiskUnlinkedException - if you have not set an access token pair on the session, or if the user has revoked access.
        VDiskFileSizeException - if the file is bigger than the maximum allowed by the API. See VDiskAPI.MAX_UPLOAD_SIZE.
        VDiskServerException - if the server responds with an error code. See the constants in VDiskServerException for the meaning of each error code. The most common error codes you can expect from this call are 404 (path to upload not found), 507 (user over quota), and 400 (unexpected parent rev).
        VDiskIOException - if any network-related error occurs.
        VDiskException - for any other unknown errors. This is also a superclass of all other VDisk exceptions, so you may want to only catch this exception which signals that some kind of error occurred.

      • putFileRequest

        public VDiskAPI.UploadRequest putFileRequest(String path,
                                    InputStream is,
                                    long length,
                                    String parentRev,
                                    ProgressListener listener)
                                      throws VDiskException
        Creates a request to upload a file to VDisk, which you can then upload() or abort(). The upload will not overwrite any existing version of the file, unless the latest version has the same rev as the parentRev given. Pass in null if you're expecting this to create a new file.
        参数:
        path - the full VDisk path where to put the file, including directories and filename.
        is - the InputStream from which to upload.
        length - the amount of bytes to read from the InputStream.
        parentRev - the rev of the file at which the user started editing it (obtained from a metadata call), or null if this is a new upload. If null, or if it does not match the latest rev on the server, a copy of the file will be created and you'll receive the new metadata upon executing the request.
        listener - an optional ProgressListener to receive upload progress updates, or null.
        返回:
        an VDiskAPI.UploadRequest.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the file does not exist.
        VDiskUnlinkedException - if you have not set an access token pair on the session, or if the user has revoked access.
        VDiskFileSizeException - if the file is bigger than the maximum allowed by the API. See VDiskAPI.MAX_UPLOAD_SIZE.
        VDiskException - for any other unknown errors. This is also a superclass of all other VDisk exceptions, so you may want to only catch this exception which signals that some kind of error occurred.

      • putFileOverwrite

        public VDiskAPI.Entry putFileOverwrite(String path,
                              InputStream is,
                              long length,
                              ProgressListener listener)
                                throws VDiskException
        Uploads a file to VDisk. The upload will overwrite any existing version of the file. Use putFileRequest() if you want to be able to cancel the upload. If you expect the user to be able to edit a file remotely and locally, then conflicts may arise and you won't want to use this call: see putFileRequest instead.
        参数:
        path - the full VDisk path where to put the file, including directories and filename.
        is - the InputStream from which to upload.
        length - the amount of bytes to read from the InputStream.
        listener - an optional ProgressListener to receive upload progress updates, or null.
        返回:
        a metadata VDiskAPI.Entry representing the uploaded file.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the file does not exist.
        VDiskUnlinkedException - if you have not set an access token pair on the session, or if the user has revoked access.
        VDiskFileSizeException - if the file is bigger than the maximum allowed by the API. See VDiskAPI.MAX_UPLOAD_SIZE.
        VDiskServerException - if the server responds with an error code. See the constants in VDiskServerException for the meaning of each error code. The most common error codes you can expect from this call are 404 (path to upload not found), 507 (user over quota), and 400 (unexpected parent rev).
        VDiskIOException - if any network-related error occurs.
        VDiskException - for any other unknown errors. This is also a superclass of all other VDisk exceptions, so you may want to only catch this exception which signals that some kind of error occurred.

      • putFileOverwriteRequest

        public VDiskAPI.UploadRequest putFileOverwriteRequest(String path,
                                             InputStream is,
                                             long length,
                                             ProgressListener listener)
                                               throws VDiskException
        Creates a request to upload a file to VDisk, which you can then upload() or abort(). The upload will overwrite any existing version of the file. If you expect the user to be able to edit a file remotely and locally, then conflicts may arise and you won't want to use this call: see putFileRequest instead.
        参数:
        path - the full VDisk path where to put the file, including directories and filename.
        is - the InputStream from which to upload.
        length - the amount of bytes to read from the InputStream.
        listener - an optional ProgressListener to receive upload progress updates, or null.
        返回:
        an VDiskAPI.UploadRequest.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the file does not exist locally.
        VDiskUnlinkedException - if you have not set an access token pair on the session, or if the user has revoked access.
        VDiskFileSizeException - if the file is bigger than the maximum allowed by the API. See VDiskAPI.MAX_UPLOAD_SIZE.
        VDiskException - for any other unknown errors. This is also a superclass of all other VDisk exceptions, so you may want to only catch this exception which signals that some kind of error occurred.

      • putLargeFileOverwriteRequest

        public void putLargeFileOverwriteRequest(String srcPath,
                                String desPath,
                                long length,
                                ComplexUploadHandler handler)
                                  throws VDiskException
        Upload a large file to VDisk by cutting the file to several segments. The upload will overwrite any existing version of the file.If you expect the user to be able to edit a file remotely and locally, then conflicts may arise and you won't want to use this call: see putLargeFileRequest instead.
        参数:
        srcPath - the local path of the file.
        desPath - the full VDisk path where to put the file, including directories and filename.
        length - the length of the local file.
        handler - the handler to control the upload session.
        抛出:
        VDiskException

      • putLargeFileRequest

        public void putLargeFileRequest(String srcPath,
                       String desPath,
                       long length,
                       long segmentLength,
                       boolean overwrite,
                       String parentRev,
                       ComplexUploadHandler handler)
                         throws VDiskException
        Upload a large file to VDisk by cutting the file to several segments.
        参数:
        srcPath - the local path of the file.
        desPath - the full VDisk path where to put the file, including directories and filename.
        length - the length of the local file.
        segmentLength - the length of a segment after you cutting the local file, default length is 4Mb.
        overwrite - whether to overwrite the file if it already exists. If true, any existing file will always be overwritten. If false, files will be overwritten only if the parentRev matches the current rev on the server or otherwise a conflicted copy of the file will be created and you will get the new file's metadata VDiskAPI.Entry.
        parentRev - the rev of the file at which the user started editing it (obtained from a metadata call), or null if this is a new upload. If null, or if it does not match the latest rev on the server, a copy of the file will be created and you'll receive the new metadata upon executing the request.
        handler - the handler to control the upload session.
        抛出:
        VDiskException

      • startComplexUpload

        private VDiskAPI.Entry startComplexUpload(VDiskAPI.VDiskUploadFileInfo fileInfo,
                                long length,
                                ComplexUploadHandler handler,
                                boolean overwrite,
                                String parentRev)
                                   throws VDiskException
        Start uploading all segments to server.
        参数:
        fileInfo - the file info of the uploading file.
        length - the length of the local file.
        handler - the handler to control the upload session.
        overwrite - whether to overwrite the file if it already exists. If true, any existing file will always be overwritten. If false, files will be overwritten only if the parentRev matches the current rev on the server or otherwise a conflicted copy of the file will be created and you will get the new file's metadata VDiskAPI.Entry.
        parentRev - the rev of the file at which the user started editing it (obtained from a metadata call), or null if this is a new upload. If null, or if it does not match the latest rev on the server, a copy of the file will be created and you'll receive the new metadata upon executing the request.
        返回:
        抛出:
        VDiskException

      • startComplexUploadMerge

        private VDiskAPI.Entry startComplexUploadMerge(VDiskAPI.VDiskUploadFileInfo fileInfo,
                                     boolean overwrite,
                                     String parentRev)
                                        throws VDiskException
        After uploading all segments to server, we should request the server to merge the segments.
        参数:
        fileInfo - the file info of the uploading file.
        overwrite - whether to overwrite the file if it already exists. If true, any existing file will always be overwritten. If false, files will be overwritten only if the parentRev matches the current rev on the server or otherwise a conflicted copy of the file will be created and you will get the new file's metadata VDiskAPI.Entry.
        parentRev - the rev of the file at which the user started editing it (obtained from a metadata call), or null if this is a new upload. If null, or if it does not match the latest rev on the server, a copy of the file will be created and you'll receive the new metadata upon executing the request.
        返回:
        抛出:
        VDiskException

      • startComplexUploadMultipartInit

        public VDiskAPI.VDiskUploadFileInfo startComplexUploadMultipartInit(String srcPath,
                                                           String desPath,
                                                           long segmentLength,
                                                           long length,
                                                           String sha1,
                                                           String s3Host,
                                                           boolean overwrite,
                                                           String parentRev)
                                                             throws VDiskException
        Get signature of each segment of the upload file.
        参数:
        srcPath - the local path of the file.
        desPath - the full VDisk path where to put the file, including directories and filename.
        length - the length of the local file.
        segmentLength - the length of a segment after you cutting the local file, default length is 4Mb.
        sha1 - the sha1 of the upload file.
        overwrite - whether to overwrite the file if it already exists. If true, any existing file will always be overwritten. If false, files will be overwritten only if the parentRev matches the current rev on the server or otherwise a conflicted copy of the file will be created and you will get the new file's metadata VDiskAPI.Entry.
        parentRev - the rev of the file at which the user started editing it (obtained from a metadata call), or null if this is a new upload. If null, or if it does not match the latest rev on the server, a copy of the file will be created and you'll receive the new metadata upon executing the request.
        返回:
        抛出:
        VDiskException

      • getS3Host

        public String getS3Host(ComplexUploadHandler handler)
                 throws VDiskException
        Get the nearest server for uploading file. S3 means Sina Storage Service. VDisk put all upload files to S3.
        抛出:
        VDiskException

      • getThumbnail

        public VDiskAPI.VDiskFileInfo getThumbnail(String path,
                                  OutputStream os,
                                  VDiskAPI.ThumbSize size,
                                  ProgressListener listener)
                                    throws VDiskException
        Downloads a thumbnail from VDisk, copying it to the output stream. Returns the VDiskAPI.VDiskFileInfo for the downloaded thumbnail.
        参数:
        path - the VDisk path to the file for which you want to get a thumbnail.
        os - the OutputStream to write the thumbnail to.
        size - the size of the thumbnail to download.
        format - the image format of the thumbnail to download.
        listener - an optional ProgressListener to receive progress updates as the thumbnail downloads, or null.
        返回:
        the VDiskAPI.VDiskFileInfo for the downloaded thumbnail.
        抛出:
        VDiskUnlinkedException - if you have not set an access token pair on the session, or if the user has revoked access.
        VDiskServerException - if the server responds with an error code. See the constants in VDiskServerException for the meaning of each error code. The most common error codes you can expect from this call are 404 (path not found or can't be thumbnailed), 415 (this type of file can't be thumbnailed), and 500 (internal error while creating thumbnail).
        VDiskPartialFileException - if a network error occurs during the download.
        VDiskIOException - for some network-related errors.
        VDiskException - for any other unknown errors. This is also a superclass of all other VDisk exceptions, so you may want to only catch this exception which signals that some kind of error occurred.

      • getThumbnailStream

        public VDiskAPI.VDiskInputStream getThumbnailStream(String path,
                                           VDiskAPI.ThumbSize size)
                                             throws VDiskException
        Downloads a thumbnail from VDisk. Returns a VDiskAPI.VDiskInputStream via which the thumbnail can be read from the network. You must close the stream when you're done with it to release all resources. You can also cancel the thumbnail download by closing the returned VDiskAPI.VDiskInputStream at any time.
        参数:
        path - the VDisk path to the file for which you want to get a thumbnail.
        size - the size of the thumbnail to download.
        format - the image format of the thumbnail to download.
        返回:
        a VDiskAPI.VDiskInputStream from which to read the thumbnail. The contents are retrieved from the network and not stored locally.
        抛出:
        VDiskUnlinkedException - if you have not set an access token pair on the session, or if the user has revoked access.
        VDiskServerException - if the server responds with an error code. See the constants in VDiskServerException for the meaning of each error code. The most common error codes you can expect from this call are 404 (path not found or can't be thumbnailed), 415 (this type of file can't be thumbnailed), and 500 (internal error while creating thumbnail)
        VDiskIOException - if any network-related error occurs.
        VDiskException - for any other unknown errors. This is also a superclass of all other VDisk exceptions, so you may want to only catch this exception which signals that some kind of error occurred.

      • getThumbnailInfo

        public VDiskAPI.VDiskFileInfo getThumbnailInfo(String path,
                                      VDiskAPI.ThumbSize size)
                                        throws VDiskException
        Get the thumnail info.
        参数:

        size - the size of the thumbnail to download.

        抛出:

      • metadata

        public VDiskAPI.Entry metadata(String path,
                      String hash,
                      boolean list,
                      boolean includeDeleted)
                        throws VDiskException
        Returns the metadata for a file, or for a directory and (optionally) its immediate children.
        参数:
        path - the VDisk path to the file or directory for which to get metadata.
        hash - if you previously got metadata for a directory and have it stored, pass in the returned hash. If the directory has not changed since you got the hash, a 304 VDiskServerException will be thrown. Pass in null for files or unknown directories.
        list - if true, returns metadata for a directory's immediate children, or just the directory entry itself if false. Ignored for files.
        includeDeleted - optionally gets metadata for a file at a prior rev (does not apply to folders). Use false for the latest metadata.
        返回:
        a metadata VDiskAPI.Entry.
        抛出:
        VDiskUnlinkedException - if you have not set an access token pair on the session, or if the user has revoked access.
        VDiskServerException - if the server responds with an error code. See the constants in VDiskServerException for the meaning of each error code. The most common error codes you can expect from this call are 304 (contents haven't changed based on the hash), 404 (path not found or unknown rev for path), and 406 (too many entries to return).
        VDiskIOException - if any network-related error occurs.
        VDiskException - for any other unknown errors. This is also a superclass of all other VDisk exceptions, so you may want to only catch this exception which signals that some kind of error occurred.

      • revisions

        public List<VDiskAPI.Entry> revisions(String path,
                             int revLimit)
                               throws VDiskException
        Returns a list of metadata for all revs of the path.
        参数:
        path - the VDisk path to the file for which to get revisions (directories are not supported).
        revLimit - the maximum number of revisions to return. Default is 10 if you pass in 0 or less, and 1,000 is the most that will ever be returned.
        返回:
        a list of metadata entries.
        抛出:
        VDiskUnlinkedException - if you have not set an access token pair on the session, or if the user has revoked access.
        VDiskServerException - if the server responds with an error code. See the constants in VDiskServerException for the meaning of each error code. The most common error code you can expect from this call is 404 (no revisions found for path).
        VDiskIOException - if any network-related error occurs.
        VDiskException - for any other unknown errors. This is also a superclass of all other VDisk exceptions, so you may want to only catch this exception which signals that some kind of error occurred.

      • search

        public List<VDiskAPI.Entry> search(String path,
                          String query,
                          int fileLimit,
                          boolean includeDeleted)
                            throws VDiskException
        Searches a directory for entries matching the query.
        参数:
        path - the VDisk directory to search in.
        query - the query to search for (minimum 3 characters).
        fileLimit - the maximum number of file entries to return. Default is 1,000 if you pass in 0 or less, and 1,000 is the most that will ever be returned.
        includeDeleted - whether to include deleted files in search results.
        返回:
        a list of metadata entries of matching files.
        抛出:
        VDiskUnlinkedException - if you have not set an access token pair on the session, or if the user has revoked access.
        VDiskServerException - if the server responds with an error code. See the constants in VDiskServerException for the meaning of each error code.
        VDiskIOException - if any network-related error occurs.
        VDiskException - for any other unknown errors. This is also a superclass of all other VDisk exceptions, so you may want to only catch this exception which signals that some kind of error occurred.

      • move

        public VDiskAPI.Entry move(String fromPath,
                  String toPath)
                    throws VDiskException
        Moves a file or folder (and all of the folder's contents) from one path to another.
        参数:
        fromPath - the VDisk path to move from.
        toPath - the full VDisk path to move to (not just a directory).
        返回:
        a metadata VDiskAPI.Entry.
        抛出:
        VDiskUnlinkedException - if you have not set an access token pair on the session, or if the user has revoked access.
        VDiskServerException - if the server responds with an error code. See the constants in VDiskServerException for the meaning of each error code. The most common error codes you can expect from this call are 403 (operation is forbidden), 404 (path not found), and 507 (user over quota).
        VDiskIOException - if any network-related error occurs.
        VDiskException - for any other unknown errors. This is also a superclass of all other VDisk exceptions, so you may want to only catch this exception which signals that some kind of error occurred.

      • copy

        public VDiskAPI.Entry copy(String fromPath,
                  String toPath)
                    throws VDiskException
        Copies a file or folder (and all of the folder's contents) from one path to another.
        参数:
        fromPath - the VDisk path to copy from.
        toPath - the full VDisk path to copy to (not just a directory).
        返回:
        a metadata VDiskAPI.Entry.
        抛出:
        VDiskUnlinkedException - if you have not set an access token pair on the session, or if the user has revoked access.
        VDiskServerException - if the server responds with an error code. See the constants in VDiskServerException for the meaning of each error code. The most common error codes you can expect from this call are 403 (operation is forbidden), 404 (path not found), and 507 (user over quota).
        VDiskIOException - if any network-related error occurs.
        VDiskException - for any other unknown errors. This is also a superclass of all other VDisk exceptions, so you may want to only catch this exception which signals that some kind of error occurred.

        public VDiskAPI.Entry createFolder(String path)
                            throws VDiskException
        Creates a new VDisk folder.
        参数:

        返回:
        a metadata VDiskAPI.Entry for the new folder.
        抛出:
        VDiskUnlinkedException - if you have not set an access token pair on the session, or if the user has revoked access.

        VDiskIOException - if any network-related error occurs.

      • delete

        public VDiskAPI.Entry delete(String path)
                      throws VDiskException
        Deletes a file or folder (and all of the folder's contents). After deletion, metadata calls may still return this file or folder for some time, but the metadata VDiskAPI.Entry's isDeleted attribute will be set to true.
        参数:
        path - the VDisk path to delete.
        抛出:
        VDiskUnlinkedException - if you have not set an access token pair on the session, or if the user has revoked access.
        VDiskServerException - if the server responds with an error code. See the constants in VDiskServerException for the meaning of each error code. The most common error code you can expect from this call is 404 (path not found).
        VDiskIOException - if any network-related error occurs.
        VDiskException - for any other unknown errors. This is also a superclass of all other VDisk exceptions, so you may want to only catch this exception which signals that some kind of error occurred.

        public VDiskAPI.Entry restore(String path,
                     String rev)
                       throws VDiskException
        Restores a file to a previous rev.
        参数:
        path - the VDisk path to the file to restore.
        rev - the rev to restore to (obtained from a metadata or revisions call).
        返回:
        a metadata VDiskAPI.Entry for the newly restored file.
        抛出:
        VDiskUnlinkedException - if you have not set an access token pair on the session, or if the user has revoked access.
        VDiskServerException - if the server responds with an error code. See the constants in VDiskServerException for the meaning of each error code. The most common error code you can expect from this call is 404 (path not found or unknown revision).
        VDiskIOException - if any network-related error occurs.
        VDiskException - for any other unknown errors. This is also a superclass of all other VDisk exceptions, so you may want to only catch this exception which signals that some kind of error occurred.

      • media

        public VDiskAPI.VDiskLink media(String path,
                       boolean ssl)
                         throws VDiskException
        Returns a VDiskAPI.VDiskLink for a stream of the given file path.
        参数:
        path - the VDisk path of the file for which to get a streaming link.
        ssl - whether the streaming URL is https or http. Some Android and other platforms won't play https streams, so false converts the link to an http link before returning it.
        返回:
        a VDiskAPI.VDiskLink for streaming the file.
        抛出:
        VDiskUnlinkedException - if you have not set an access token pair on the session, or if the user has revoked access.
        VDiskServerException - if the server responds with an error code. See the constants in VDiskServerException for the meaning of each error code. The most common error code you can expect from this call is 404 (path not found).
        VDiskIOException - if any network-related error occurs.
        VDiskException - for any other unknown errors. This is also a superclass of all other VDisk exceptions, so you may want to only catch this exception which signals that some kind of error occurred.

      • share

        public String share(String path)
             throws VDiskException
        Generates a Link for sharing the specified file. Notice: the file'size need to be less than 200MB; the file should be in the following types: 'application/epub+zip', 'application/kswps', 'application/msword', 'application/octet-stream', 'application/pdf', 'application/postscript', 'application/vnd.android.package-archive', 'application/vnd.ms-cab-compressed', 'application/vnd.ms-excel', 'application/vnd.ms-powerpoint', 'application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.presentationml.presentatio n ' , 'application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet', 'application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document' , 'application/vnd.rn-realmedia', 'application/vnd.rn-realmedia-vbr', 'application/vnd.symbian.install', 'application/x-7z-compressed', 'application/x-bzip2', 'application/x-chm', 'application/x-itunes-ipa', 'application/x-rar-compressed', 'application/x-shockwave-flash', 'application/x-gzip', 'application/x-zip', 'audio/mp3', 'audio/x-aac', 'audio/x-flac', 'audio/x-monkeys-audio', 'audio/x-ms-wma', 'image/bmp', 'image/gif', 'image/jpeg', 'image/pjpeg', 'image/png', 'image/vnd.adobe.photoshop', 'text/plain', 'video/3gpp', 'video/avi', 'video/mp4', 'video/quicktime', 'video/mpeg', 'video/x-flv', 'video/x-matroska', 'video/x-ms-wmv', 'x-epoc/x-sisx-app'
        参数:
        path - the VDisk file path to share.
        返回:
        a Share Link for the path.
        抛出:
        VDiskUnlinkedException - if you have not set an access token pair on the session, or if the user has revoked access.
        VDiskServerException - if the server responds with an error code. See the constants in VDiskServerException for the meaning of each error code. The most common error code you can expect from this call is 404 (path not found).
        VDiskIOException - if any network-related error occurs.
        VDiskException - for any other unknown errors. This is also a superclass of all other VDisk exceptions, so you may want to only catch this exception which signals that some kind of error occurred.

      • putFileRequest

        private VDiskAPI.UploadRequest putFileRequest(String path,
                                    InputStream is,
                                    long length,
                                    boolean overwrite,
                                    String parentRev,
                                    ProgressListener listener)
                                       throws VDiskException
        Creates a request to upload an InputStream to a VDisk file. You can then upload() or abort() this request. This is the advanced version, which you should only use if you really need the flexibility of uploading using an InputStream.
        参数:
        path - the full VDisk path where to put the file, including directories and filename.
        is - the InputStream from which to upload.
        length - the amount of bytes to read from the InputStream.
        overwrite - whether to overwrite the file if it already exists. If true, any existing file will always be overwritten. If false, files will be overwritten only if the parentRev matches the current rev on the server or otherwise a conflicted copy of the file will be created and you will get the new file's metadata VDiskAPI.Entry.
        parentRev - the rev of the file at which the user started editing it (obtained from a metadata call), or null if this is a new upload. If null, or if it does not match the latest rev on the server, a copy of the file will be created and you'll receive the new metadata upon executing the request.
        listener - an optional ProgressListener to receive upload progress updates, or null.
        返回:
        an VDiskAPI.UploadRequest.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if newFilename is null or empty.
        VDiskUnlinkedException - if you have not set an access token pair on the session, or if the user has revoked access.
        VDiskFileSizeException - if the file is bigger than the maximum allowed by the API. See VDiskAPI.MAX_UPLOAD_SIZE.
        VDiskException - for any other unknown errors. This is also a superclass of all other VDisk exceptions, so you may want to only catch this exception which signals that some kind of error occurred.

      • delta

        public VDiskAPI.DeltaPage<VDiskAPI.Entry> delta(String cursor)
                                         throws VDiskException
        A way of letting you keep up with changes to files and folders in a user's VDisk. You can periodically call this function to get a list of "delta entries", which are instructions on how to update your local state to match the server's state.
        参数:
        cursor - On the first call, you should pass in null. On subsequent calls, pass in the cursor returned by the previous call.
        返回:
        A single DeltaPage of results. The hasMore field will tell you whether the server has more pages of results to return. If the server doesn't have more results, you can wait a bit (say, 5 or 10 minutes) and poll again.
        抛出:
        VDiskUnlinkedException - if you have not set an access token pair on the session, or if the user has revoked access.
        VDiskException - for any other unknown errors. This is also a superclass of all other VDisk exceptions, so you may want to only catch this exception which signals that some kind of error occurred.

      • createCopyRef

        public VDiskAPI.CreatedCopyRef createCopyRef(String sourcePath)
                                      throws VDiskException
        Creates a reference to a path that can be used with addFromCopyRef() to copy the contents of the file at that path to a different VDisk account. This is more efficient than copying the content
        参数:
        sourcePath - The full path to the file that you want a
        返回:
        A string representation of the file pointer.
        抛出:
        VDiskUnlinkedException - if you have not set an access token pair on the session, or if the user has revoked access.
        VDiskException - for any other unknown errors. This is also a superclass of all other VDisk exceptions, so you may want to only catch this exception which signals that some kind of error occurred.

      • addFromCopyRef

        public VDiskAPI.Entry addFromCopyRef(String sourceCopyRef,
                            String targetPath)
                              throws VDiskException
        Creates a file in the VDisk that the client is currently connected to, using the contents from a CopyRef created with createCopyRef(). The CreatedCopyRef can be for a file in a different VDisk account.
        参数:
        sourceCopyRef - The copy-ref to use as the source of the file data (comes from CreatedCopyRef.copyRef, which is created through createCopyRef()).
        targetPath - The path that you want to create the file at.
        返回:
        The VDiskAPI.Entry for the new file.
        抛出:
        VDiskUnlinkedException - if you have not set an access token pair on the session, or if the user has revoked access.
        VDiskException - for any other unknown errors. This is also a superclass of all other VDisk exceptions, so you may want to only catch this exception which signals that some kind of error occurred.
